greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 0; a(prime) = 1; otherwise a(n) = 1 + a(A181819(n)).
comment: Except for n = 2, same as A182850. Unlike A182850, the terms of this sequence depend only on the prime signature (A118914) of the index.
xref: Positions of 1's are the prime numbers A000040.
Positions of 2's are the proper prime powers A246547.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jan 02 2019
